# upcloud_file_storage_share_acl (Resource)

This resource represents a File Storage Share ACL entry.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required Attributes

- `file_storage` (String) UUID of the file storage service.
- `name` (String) Unique name of the ACL entry (1â€“64 chars).
- `permission` (String) Access level: 'ro' or 'rw'.
- `share_name` (String) Name of the share.
- `target` (String) Target IP/CIDR or '*'.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) UUID of the file storage share ACL.
